name: i18ntranslate
description: Translates all missing i18n entries in PR builds
author: Steven Thuriot

inputs.name: authkey
inputs.label: DeepL AuthKey
inputs.helpMarkDown: Auth Key used for the DeepL API.

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Current working directory when i18ntranslate is run. Leave empty to use the root folder of your repository.'

inputs.name: defaultLanguage
inputs.label: Source Language
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Source language that is being used, should match your i18n filename.

inputs.name: translateVersion
inputs.label: Tool version
inputs.helpMarkDown: dotnet tool version that will be used.

inputs.name: validate
inputs.label: Run validation only
inputs.helpMarkDown: Don't actually translate, only run validation to check for missing keys.
